Name: [Freeze] Icicle Shooter
Desc: Triggering <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color> leaves an icy mist that lasts 10s. This effect can trigger once every 10s. <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> against enemies caught in the mist deal <color=#2BAD00>80%</color> more CRIT DMG.
Desc2: This sweet Resonium can shoot small icicles, but it costs a pretty penny in water bills. Still, that doesn't stop folks from taking it out and having some fun on the streets whenever it rains.
